alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:29PM EDT until June 26 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Seneca County in central New York... Northwestern Schuyler County in central New York... Eastern Yates County in central New York... Northeastern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pulteney, or near Dundee, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Romulus, Fayette, Starkey, Benton, Urbana, Dundee, Tyrone, Pulteney and Wayne. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
